author: Home Repair Tutor
description: How to remove a toilet…I turn that water off at the valve and flush all the water from the tank. Then I pour LiquiLock into the bowl. It takes about 5 minutes for all the water to gel. Then I can remove the toilet without dripping water onto the floor 😅👍🏽#plumbing #bathroomremodel #toilet
title: How to Remove a Toilet - #shorts #homerepairtutor
